posts.postText: For Some reason, whenever I play Tf2, Custom Files don't load, Sounds from No Heroes don't play, All Saxton Hales are now error models and so is the Amplifier, nothing Custom loads, despite me being able to find the files in my Tf folder, They all use to work but now just fail for some reason, each time I go to a Server It will try to redownload the models but are still errors for some reason 0-_0-
Tryyyyyyyyyy.... Going into options, multiplayer, and there should be a dropbox, click "allow custom files from servers" Just a simple fix... may not be right.
Turns out it might be the servers fault testing now
